thread.title: Jacob
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Jacob

author: Jacob
title: Jacob
text:
Mr. Nichols is the best! My job did not give me all my paperwork at one time, so I went and filed my taxes, not realizing there was a missing 1099 form. I did not receive this form until a week later with my subsequent check.
I called Mr. Ron Nichols, who took care of it for me at no extra charge. I e-mailed him a picture of the form, and everything was ok.
Great company!
